item.title: VFC
item.description: score:155 Chances: VF Corp. (VFC) operates in the lucrative business of producing and marketing apparel, footwear, and accessories. The company has a diversified portfolio of brands and products, covering outdoor, active, work, and other segments. The recent cyberattack on VF Corp. may create a buying opportunity for investors if the company takes appropriate measures to address the issue and strengthen its cybersecurity capabilities.
